name: Ninja Game: Just My Levels
description:
This is a game I made in collaboration with a few other High School DigiPen students. I personally created the Enemy AI, The Boss, and level 6 and 7 as well as  some weapon interaction and physics.  The rest of the game is basically a broken mess, so here are just the parts I created. Keep in mind these are using other broken features from the rest of the game, and they themselves are very much flawed, but they are at least beatable :).

We only had about a week and a half  to create it, and many of the other team member were not able to contribute very much due to scheduling or other constraints, so it was not nearly as polished as I would have liked. However, I think it is interesting nonetheless. Hope you  enjoy out garbage fire!
